summary: THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A MECHANIC TO HAVE THE AIR PRESSURE CHECKED.  THE MECHANIC NOTICED CRACKS IN THE FRONT TIRE.  THE CONSUMER INDICATED THAT THE CRACKS WERE NOT FROM WEAR.   THE BIKE WAS PURCHASED NEW WITH ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT.  *NLM,  RETURNED USPS, 2ND ATTEMPT MADE 06/08/07 FAILED * LJ
